"Salvation Vanguard":
"Based on his calculations, Xiao concluded a way to
grant <%me> the power to save Persona.
A major ARKS operation is about to begin. Go
now to the place where your destiny awaits.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
